entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character and nephew of Vernon. He is described as an unsatisfactory person by his aunt.

entities.name: vernon
entities.description: Vernon is Harry's uncle. He is mentioned in a conversation with Aunt Marge about Harry's behavior.

entities.name: aunt marge
entities.description: Aunt Marge is the aunt of Harry and Vernon. She makes derogatory comments about Harry's behavior and uses a dog breeding analogy to explain it.

entities.name: hogsmeade
entities.description: Hogsmeade is a location mentioned in Harry's thoughts as something he should focus on instead of reacting to his aunt's comments.

relationships.description: Aunt Marge criticizes Harry for being an unsatisfactory person, implying that there is something wrong with him on the inside.
